thread.title: Five questions with Utah beat writer Kyle Goon
thread.title_full: Five questions with Utah beat writer Kyle Goon - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Connor Letourneau
title: Five questions with Utah beat writer Kyle Goon
text:
Photo: Ryan Kang / Associated Press Utah quarterback Travis Wilson (7) hugs his family after an NCAA college football game against Oregon, Saturday, Sept. 26, 2015, in Eugene, Ore. (AP Photo/Ryan Kang) Utah quarterback Travis Wilson (7) hugs his family after an NCAA...
Each Wednesday throughout Cal’s football season, The Chronicle is catching up with a beat reporter for the Bears’ upcoming opponent. Below is a Q&A with Kyle Goon, who covers Utah for The Salt Lake Tribune. Cal faces the Utes at 7 p.m. PT Saturday. Utah quarterback Travis Wilson (7) hugs his family after an NCAA college football game against Oregon, Saturday, Sept. 26, 2015, in Eugene, Ore.
